sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 24 cm. What is the length of one side of the triangle?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of one side, we can divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Perimeter = 24 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of one side = Perimeter / Number of sides = 24 cm / 3 = 8 cm
